text: Lissotrachelini is a tribe of anomalous crickets in the family Gryllidae. There are at least three genera and about nine described species in Lissotrachelini. ==Genera== These three genera belong to the tribe Lissotrachelini: * Lissotrachelus Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 * Tohila Hubbell, 1938 * Trigonidomimus Caudell, 1912 ==References== ==Further reading== * * Category:Crickets Category:Orthoptera tribes
title: Lissotrachelini
